body:
Install error:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/srv/app/wsgi.py", line 20, in <module>
    application = make_app(config)
  File "/srv/app/src/ckan/ckan/config/middleware/__init__.py", line 27, in make_app
    load_environment(conf)
  File "/srv/app/src/ckan/ckan/config/environment.py", line 69, in load_environment
    p.load_all()
  File "/srv/app/src/ckan/ckan/plugins/core.py", line 224, in load_all
    load(*plugins)
  File "/srv/app/src/ckan/ckan/plugins/core.py", line 240, in load
    service = _get_service(plugin)
  File "/srv/app/src/ckan/ckan/plugins/core.py", line 347, in _get_service
    return plugin.load()(name=plugin_name)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.10/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 2442, in load
    self.require(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.10/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 2465, in require
    items = working_set.resolve(reqs, env, installer, extras=self.extras)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.10/site-packages/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 786, in resolve
    raise DistributionNotFound(req, requirers)
pkg_resources.DistributionNotFound: The 'pkgutil-resolve-name>=1.3.10; python_version < "3.9"' distribution was not found and is required by jsonschema
unable to load app 0 (mountpoint='') (callable not found or import error)
*** no app loaded. going in full dynamic mode ***
```

[Related issue](https://github.com/transparencia-mg/work-stefanini/issues/95#issuecomment-1363333431)

comments.body:
@gabrielbdornas eu tive este problema agora pela manhã refazendo o ambiente, fui instalando cada dependência que indicava pendência até voltar ao problema do dataclasses, mas encontrei uma possível explicação:

[Indicação da remoção do dataclasses como dependência - 10/10/2022](https://github.com/Textualize/rich/blob/234d1eaa2a430c7a5766890e3bec13befca6dbc4/poetry.lockl)

![Última versão lançada da biblioteca rich 02/10/2022](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/223948/209652042-7485efaf-cc2e-432c-8cd6-29cf5ed345f3.png)

A tag 12.6.0 que é justamente da última versão instalada da rich contém essa dependência da dataclasses:

![Arquivo do poetry.lock](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/223948/209652434-6e39702b-0e8a-45aa-9545-31b2975dce44.png)

title: Version 0.0.7 intall error

body: @gabrielbdornas, @andreiadonca e @Andrelamor foram adicionadas as instruções de instalação no README.md e publicada a nova versão
title: Instruções para instalação

comments.body: @gileno , conforme informado por você a mudança para salvar em um novo modelo já foi realizada,  sendo assim fecharei o issue.

title: Salvamento dos metadados

body: @gileno do you mand if we change our branch `master` to `main`?

comments.body:
@gabrielbdornas I didn't realize it was master, I believe it was because the repository was created if the README.md and initial .gitignore
I will do

> @gabrielbdornas I didn't realize it was master, I believe it was because the repository was created if the README.md and initial .gitignore I will do

Great!
@gabrielbdornas I created the branch "main" but it is necessary to go to the repository settings to change it on github

@gileno, modifiquei a branch principal do projeto para main:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49699290/208909192-ae4fbc0e-3770-4a84-9a4b-f2c2a377fe8e.png)

Solicito que realize o merge de tudo que está na master (ATUALIZAR COM EVENTUAIS COMMITS DA SUA MÁQUINA QUE POR VENTURA NÃO TENHA SIDO SINCRONIZADOS VIA PULL) na main via criação e aprovação de um PR.

Também habilitei esta funcionalidade no repositório:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49699290/208909557-d4a5b5ee-c786-4a8b-b644-1975326022d0.png)

Sendo assim, quando você aprovar o PR solicitado acima a branch `master` será excluída automanticamente. Após todo processo recomendo exclui-la de sua máquina também (`git branch -D master`) para evitar confusões.

Em caso de dúvidas estou à disposição.
Issue resolvido dia 26/12/2022 em reunião na parte da manhã com @gileno

title: Atualizar branch principal do projeto para `main`

body:
@gileno as talked, we must create an automated process to publish/update the package on [pypi](https://pypi.org/).

We did this in our [dpckan](https://github.com/transparencia-mg/dpckan) package using [this `Makefile`](https://github.com/transparencia-mg/dpckan/blob/dev/Makefile). We could do the same here.

The only problem/inconvenient will be updating the package version on `setup.py` file every new update on  [pypi](https://pypi.org/) because it doesn't allow to publish new code in already publish versions.

https://github.com/transparencia-mg/ckanext-datapackage-creator/blob/b7c1e718885dbdeb0c159c1c2b5534e2d551c45c/setup.py#L8-L11

To better document these new releases we could use our brand new [CHANGLOG.md](https://github.com/transparencia-mg/ckanext-datapackage-creator/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) file.

To finish the task, please document all the steps used to realize the update in the `README.md` file. [Here is an example](https://github.com/transparencia-mg/dpckan/issues/6#issuecomment-851678297) that could be followed. 

TODO:
- [x] Create the `Makefile` and its necessary targets.
- [x] Publish package on PyPI (DTA account).
- [x] Include @gileno as "package maintainer"
- [x] Include @gabrielbdornas as package maintainer"
- [x] Document process on `README.md` file.

comments.body:
> @gabrielbdornas I accepted the invitation

@gileno fine. The Package was published successfully. And all process was documented in [`README.md` file](https://github.com/transparencia-mg/ckanext-datapackage-creator).

title: Create process to publish/update package on pypi
